village.entrance_message: You enter the bustling village. Villagers go about their daily lives around you.

events.name: helpful_tip
events.message: A villager gives you a helpful tip about the surrounding areas.
tips: The forest can be dangerous at night, but it's full of useful resources.
The mountain hermit is said to possess great wisdom.
Strange lights have been seen coming from the old cave.
The shopkeeper sometimes has rare items if you ask nicely.

events.name: local_gossip
events.message: You hear some interesting local gossip.
gossip: Did you hear about the treasure supposedly hidden in the mountain?
Some say there's a secret passage in the cave.
The forest spirits are more active during the full moon.
A traveling merchant was seen heading toward the mountain yesterday.

events.name: friendly_chat
events.message: You have a pleasant conversation with a villager about daily life.

rest_at_inn.name: Rest at the inn
rest_at_inn.description: Take a break at the village inn

effects.message: You rest at the cozy inn and feel completely refreshed.

visit_well.name: Visit the village well
visit_well.message: You approach the old stone well in the village center.

events.name: make_wish
events.message: You toss a coin into the well and make a wish.

events.name: draw_water
events.message: You draw some fresh, cool water from the well.

explore_houses.name: Explore the houses
explore_houses.message: You walk around the village, admiring the quaint thatched-roof houses.
explore_houses.additional_message: The villagers have built a charming community here.
